scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a man, identified as David, seated on a stool and praying with his hands clasped. He wears a royal blue robe adorned with gold patterns and a golden belt. A harp rests on the ground in front of him. To the right, a group of figures, some wearing elaborate hats, are gathered and looking towards a rocky outcrop. In the background, a castle with blue-tiled roofs and towers is visible. Birds fly in the sky above the castle. The overall setting appears to be a landscape with rolling hills and vegetation.
